faqData.question: Implemented React features
faqData.answer:
• Passing data from parent to child component using props.
  • Added Error Boundaries for fetch data components and event handling.
  • Restrict instaPhotos to 6.
  • Using spread operator unpack the objects and pass the keys and values to owl carousel config.
  • Using firebase implemented the register, login authentication and forgot password pages.
  • After login conditional rendering of componenets.
  • Implemented login, forgot password, register, contact and checkout page validations.
  • On page refresh maintain login, redux states.
  • Implemented redux toolkit and redux toolkit persist (https://github.com/rt2zz/redux-persist).
  • Using Json fetch get the data and painted the content for home, shop, faq pages.
  • ProductDetails componenet implemented memo will cause React to skip rendering a component if its props have not changed.
  • JS set method is used in Brand, Color and Tags filter to get unique values.
  • toLocaleString added for price localization.
  • React Hooks implemented - UseState, UseEffect, UseRef.
